subSubSection.paragraph:
A. lucidus ( Kirby, 1882 )
: Bolivia, Brazil, Panama, Peru y Venezuela (Smith 1990), COLOMBIA . Amazonas , Leticia , Matamata, PNN Amacayacu, 150m , 3°41’S , 70°15’W , malaise trap, 11 September 2000 , A. Parente leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149358). Same data, 15 October 2000 , A. Parente leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149354).
